item.title: To Pay Or Not To Pay For Online Marketing
item.description:
To Pay Or Not To Pay For Online Marketing

One of the questions I regularly get asked is when should I “pay” for online marketing. When should I physically get out my credit card and pay for online marketing or can I essentially do it for free?

item.title: Here is another post
item.description:
Here is another post

Here is another post which I hope will outline how things are meant to work

item.title: Why All Dental Practices Should Consider Social Media
item.description:
Why All Dental Practices Should Consider Social Media

Did you know that more than 70% of the UK population are on Facebook? Did you also know that of those 70% approximately 75% access it daily? So in other words most of the UK population over 13 are using it, and yet, just as with other forms of social media, many organisations and businesses question the value of it's use.

item.title: Fill Your Waiting Room
item.description:
Fill Your Waiting Room

There are many ways to fill your waiting room and the following blog will outline some of these methods. you may find them slightly interesting or you may find them intensely boring, either way you'll end up reading them

item.title: How much to acquire a patient
item.description:
How much to acquire a patient

We all need regular and ongoing patients to keep our business going, looking after them is the cornerstone to any good dental practice. Come to think of it, this is the case in any business.
